title: The Noise invasion
brief_description: Fascinating exploration of the deleterious effects to health of excessive environmental noise. This noise is traced to its principal sources - in transport and industry - and technological and legislative approaches for its reduction are examined. Points out that industrial noise is causing permanent deafness in millions of people and shows the results of research.
